text.#text: The report required under

A description of violations of internationally recognized human rights and crimes against humanity
			 perpetrated during the civil war in Syria, including—

an account of the war crimes and crimes against humanity committed by the regime of President
			 Bashar al-Assad;

an account of the war crimes and crimes against humanity committed by violent extremist groups and
			 other combatants in the conflict; and

a description of the conventional and unconventional weapons used for such crimes and, where
			 possible, the origins of the weapons.
